Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.packets

package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.packets
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    PacketManager<T>
    interface that implements the methods used by the packets
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    ACK
    packet that shows the error occured during an operation
    ActivateLeader
    packet to send a request of leader activation
    AskMove
    packet to ask the server to perform a move action
    AskSwap
    packet to ask the server to perform a swap action
    BasicPacketFactory
    a class that produces packets
    BasicProduction
    packet to ask a basic production
    BonusProduction
    packet to ask a bonus production
    BuyCard
    packet that asks to perform a buy action
    BuyFailed
    packet that notifies the client that the buy failed
    ChestUpdate
    packet sent by the server to update the storage in the minimodel of the clients
    DashReset
    packet that makes the client refresh the dashboard
    DiscardResource
    packet used to discard resources
    EndGame
    packet that the server sends when the game ends
    EndGameLorenzo
    packet that the server sends when the game ends
    EndTurn
    packet that the client sends to notify the server that he/she finisched the turn
    ExtractionInstruction
    packet to send the informations about an extraction (row col - number)
    ExtreactedRedBall
    packet that notifies that a red ball has been extracted
    GameStarted
    packet that notifies the clients that the game started
    IncrementPosition
    packet that tells the new position of a player
    InsertionInstruction
    packet that sends the informations about an insertion (position)
    LastTurn
    packet that notifies that this is the last turn
    LeaderActivated
    packet that informs a client that someone activated a leader
    LeaderDiscountUpdate
    pakcet that informs that a discount leader is active
    LeaderTradeUpdate
    pakcet that informs that a trade leader is active
    LeaderWhiteUpdate
    pakcet that informs that a white ball leader is active
    Login
    packet used to perform a login
    LoginSinglePlayer
    packet used to perform a single plauyer login
    LorenzoDiscardedCard
    packet that informs about a lorenzo's action
    LorenzoPositionUpdate
    packet that informs about a lorenzo's action
    LorenzoTurn
    packet that informs that is lorenzo's turn
    MarketExtraction
    packet to ask a marcket extraction
    MarketResult
    packet that shows the result of an extraction
    MoveFailed
    packet that informs that a move failed
    NotifyOtherPlayerTurn
    packet that informs the players about who is currently playing
    OperationCompleted
    packet that informs that the operation has been completed
    Packet<T>
    the standard packet class, the father of all packets
    PapalScoreActiveted
    packet that informs that a papalscore has been activated
    PapalSpaceUpdate
    packet that informs that a papal space has been reached
    PendingCost
    packet to send a pending cost to a client
    Ping
    packet used to ping the clients
    Pong
    clients' answer to the server's ping packets
    ProdFailed
    packet that notifies that a production actually failed
    Production
    packet that asks to activate a production on a card
    Reconnect
    packet used to reconnect
    ReconnectingInfo
    packet for sharing the reconnection informations needed
    ReconnectionFailed
    packet that informs that the reconnection failed
    SelectLeader
    packet to inform the server which leader the client selected
    SetTurnType
    set what type of turn the player wants to perform
    StartGame
    packet to notify the start of the game
    StorageMassExtraction
    packet taht sends the list of resources gotten from an extraction
    StorageMassInsertion
    packet that informs which resources are inserted
    StorageUpdate
    packet that updates the storage of a player to all clients
    SwapDeposit
    packet to ask the server to perform a swap
    SwapFailed
    packet that informs that a swap failed
    TurnNotify
    packet that notifies a player that it's his turn
    TurnNotifySpecialGain
    a custom turnnotify for gains
    TurnNotifySpecialPending
    a custom turnnotify for pendin costs
    UpdateCardBuyed
    pcaket to update the cards in the shop once one is bought
    UpdateLeaders
    packet to update the leaders
    UpdateMiniMarket
    packet used to update the mini market for each client
    UpdatePosition
    packet to update the position of a player
    UserEnterGame
    packet that informs that a user enterd the game
